name: Jump Jones
description:
Submission for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2019!

The theme of the jam was "Only one", so we decided to make a simple game featuring one button input and one mechanic: jumping.

Our schedules were kinda messy this year so we scrambled together something very minimalistic in a very short period of time. We hope you enjoy it!

Press SPACEBAR to jump and avoid different traps from the temple! You can change the height/duration of the jump by HOLDING the SPACEBAR!
